title: Fed’s Mary Daly Supports Tighter Policy, Doesn’t Expect Recession
sub_head: ‘I understand that inflation is as harmful as not having a job,’ the San Francisco Fed president said
body:
Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said she doesn’t expect a recession to happen due to central-bank efforts to bring down high levels of inflation.
“I’m fairly optimistic about the U.S. economy,” Ms. Daly said at an event Tuesday.
